text: Sanga is a village in the Bhiwani district of the Indian state of Haryana. It lies east of the district headquarters at Bhiwani and from the state capital Chandigarh.Village sanga is name in great Raja rana sanga sanga village rajput ने बसाया ठाकूर उदय परमार Category:Villages in Bhiwani district
title: Sanga, Bhiwani
